93 Building an accessible web 🌐

Feb 20, 2025

  • civictech
  • episode
  • government
  • web development
  • design
  • accessibility

We’re joined by Mike Gifford, Open Standards and Practice Lead at CivicActions. We’ll dig deep into what it takes to build accessible web services and why that effort is so important.
